FileFormat.FormatDescription: Impulse Tracker is a multi-track digital sound tracker, developed by Jeffrey Lim. The Impulse Tracker Module format is similar to the MOD Audio Module format.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: IMPM The creating software version number can be found at hex position 0x28-29, and the 'minimum compatible version' number can be found at hex position 0x2A-2B. At this time PRONOM does not distinguish beteen versions.
